name: Star Secrets
description:
Stop dark objects from reaching the ground or else they will spawn into dark creatures.  Send them into the light so that they will become stars in the sky instead.

Simply click your mouse to create shock-waves, and send the invading minions of darkness back into the light!

Unlock hidden secrets written in the stars.

Please consider buying the game on Google or Apple Stores for your mobile devices! 

Feedback and suggestions welcome.
